pages.text: $(li)Toretoises are neutral creatures that spawn deep underground on the Overworld.$(br)$(li)Toretoises will sink in water, and are immune to drowning, fall, and fire damage.$(br)$(li)They come with a random type of Ore (Coal, Iron, Lapis, or Redstone).
You may try to mine the Toretoises ore located in the top with a Pickaxe to obtain that ore.

$(li)Toretoises do not breed. They do spawn like hostile creatures, so you can go back for more.$(br)$(li)Feeding a Toretoise with Cave Roots will make regenerate its ores, but when it does, it will enter an eating coldown for 1 minute.$(br)$(li)You can automate this feeding process using a Feeding Trough.

$(li)If you try to mine a Tortoise without a Pickaxe, or when it has not ore, you will attack it insteant and the Toretoise will emit a shockwave attack.$(br)$(li)This will hit any non-Toretoise entities around, and redirect their aggro to you.
